selfEmployed.description: Building modern, responsive web applications for clients worldwide. Specializing in React.js, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks.
selfEmployed.longDescription: As a freelance front-end developer, I've had the opportunity to work with diverse clients across different industries. My focus is on creating accessible and performant web apps that provide great UX.
achievements: Specialized in e-commerce boosting client revenue by 40%

projects.name: E-commerce Fashion Platform
projects.description: Online store with full payment and cart system

projects.name: Real Estate Listings
projects.description: Search/filterable platform for renting and buying properties

projects.name: Restaurant Website
projects.description: Responsive website for online ordering and multi-branch management

selfEmployed.impact: Helped clients grow digitally through fast, modern, and elegant websites.

ieeeMsb.description: Joined IEEE MSB to learn and grow in the front-end field through workshops and hands-on sessions.
ieeeMsb.longDescription: As a trainee, I participated in multiple training programs, followed structured learning paths, and built mini projects to enhance practical skills.
responsibilities: Collaborate with peers on small projects
ieeeMsb.impact: Built a strong base in front-end development through structured student training.

gdscMet.description: Participated in front-end and JavaScript track in GDSC MET sessions.
gdscMet.longDescription: Improved hands-on coding skills and participated in collaborative tasks and mentorship discussions.
gdscMet.impact: Accelerated learning through real project simulations.

gdscMenofia.description: Enrolled in front-end training bootcamp hosted by GDSC Menofia.
gdscMenofia.longDescription: Covered fundamentals and worked on small tasks related to DOM manipulation and UI creation.
gdscMenofia.impact: Gained practical exposure to front-end basics.

ieeeInstructor.description: Lead instructor for front-end development track.
ieeeInstructor.longDescription: Designed and conducted a structured 8-week front-end curriculum, including projects, quizzes, and reviews.
ieeeInstructor.impact: Contributed to student career growth by delivering job-ready skills.

deltaInstructor.description: Mentor and instructor for Delta Academy's front-end training.
deltaInstructor.longDescription: Conducted practical sessions and guided students through portfolio projects and Git usage.
deltaInstructor.impact: Prepared students for real-world freelance and job opportunities.

itiSummer.description: Participated in a professional training on Angular and component-based development.
itiSummer.longDescription: Learned how to develop SPAs using Angular, RxJS, and TypeScript. Built sample dashboards and forms.
achievements: Worked in teams with Git version control
itiSummer.impact: Gained real-work internship experience using Angular and modern tools.
